scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run dev --workspace backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:frontend: wait-on tcp:5000 && npm run dev --workspace frontend
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace frontend && npm run build --workspace backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace frontend && npm run lint --workspace backend
scripts.lint-fix: npm run lint-fix --workspace frontend && npm run lint-fix --workspace backend
scripts.prettify: npm run prettify --workspace frontend && npm run prettify --workspace backend
